programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Poultry Perfection: Moroccan Spiced Guinea Hen with Charred Vegetables
programme.desc: Andrew unlocks the rich flavor of guinea hen with a vibrant grilled salad featuring watercress and a mustard-hazelnut vinaigrette. Then, he slow-roasts a whole bird with Middle Eastern spices, served with harissa squash and eggplant-tahini purée.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Venison Paillard and Hearty Hunter's Stew
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases venison two ways: a delicate grilled paillard with artichokes and parmesan, and a rich, slow-braised Polish hunter's stew with kielbasa, mushrooms, and sauerkraut. Served with grilled leeks and coal-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess heads to Wyatt Ranches in South Texas to check out the cattle ranching operation they've been running since 1965.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases quail two ways: classic Southern fried quail with lemon-basil aioli, and as an elevated topping for a traditional open-fire paella, complete with crispy socarrat. He proves this small bird makes an extraordinary dinner.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Clams Casino and Garlicky Clam Pizza
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern celebrates cherrystone clams with two show-stopping recipes. He prepares classic grilled clams casino with pancetta, then pushes boundaries with an innovative grilled pizza topped with clams, garlic, chiles, and cheese.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Southern Shrimp Skewers and Asian Crispy Rice
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern grills beloved shrimp in two distinct ways. He starts with jumbo shrimp and country ham skewers glazed with sweet-hot pepper jelly. Then, he creates Asian-inspired shrimp, served over crispy battle rice and a complex sambal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Poultry Perfection: Moroccan Spiced Guinea Hen with Charred Vegetables
programme.desc: Andrew unlocks the rich flavor of guinea hen with a vibrant grilled salad featuring watercress and a mustard-hazelnut vinaigrette. Then, he slow-roasts a whole bird with Middle Eastern spices, served with harissa squash and eggplant-tahini purée.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Venison Paillard and Hearty Hunter's Stew
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases venison two ways: a delicate grilled paillard with artichokes and parmesan, and a rich, slow-braised Polish hunter's stew with kielbasa, mushrooms, and sauerkraut. Served with grilled leeks and coal-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dale's living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale is flipping burgers into art - gooey mac & cheese burgers, fancy French patties topped with melty bucheron cheese, crispy parm-truffle fries, and peanut butter fudge ice cream sandwiches. Get hungry.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Dale's turning up the heat! Carolina Reaper wings hotter than your ex, sweet-chili NY strip steak, smoky grilled chipotle Texas toast, and ancho-gochujang pineapple skillet cake for dessert. Bring some water!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde kicks the summer off right with a burger blowout featuring Brisket Burgers with Grilled Onions and Blue Cheese, Shrimp Burgers with XO Sauce and a Fried Egg, and Lamb Sliders with Feta Ranch and don't forget the Lemon Oregano Fries.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up summer favorites perfect for any backyard BBQ. Cheddar beer brats in a pretzel bun, BBQ lamb ribs with Chinese mustard sauce, watermelon lime soju punch, & warm donuts with grilled strawberries & whipped cream for dessert.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde channels his inner sandwich lover by making an angry lobster club with pepper aioli and grilled bacon, a lamb birria torta with avocado and ramen consomme, and his an Italian beef combo with chili crisp cheese sauce, and giardiniera.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde shows us how he does Sunday up right as he grills up some Vietnamese Brisket with Rice Noodles, Crispy Swordfish Summer Rolls, and tops it all off with some tasty Soju Floats. Hey, it's Sunday somewhere, right?

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings the heat when it comes to making perfect pork dishes including a root beer glazed pork banh mi, chorizo fried rice, Filipino sausage stuffed long hot peppers, and round it all out with a spicy grilled pineapple sundae.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: It's burger day! Chef Dale tackles three classics with a full flavor spin. Game changing Pho Burgers with bone marrow, toasted milk bread Ahi Tuna patty melts, and Chori Pan Burgers with a fried egg and shrimp chips.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde tries his hand at hibachi by making supreme fried rice with shrimp, chicken, and bacon, pretzel pork dumplings, mushroom noodles, a filet of beef with the famous onion volcano, and washes it down with a melon & mint sake slushy.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dale's living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde brings the heat when it comes to making perfect pork dishes including a root beer glazed pork banh mi, chorizo fried rice, Filipino sausage stuffed long hot peppers, and round it all out with a spicy grilled pineapple sundae.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: It's burger day! Chef Dale tackles three classics with a full flavor spin. Game changing Pho Burgers with bone marrow, toasted milk bread Ahi Tuna patty melts, and Chori Pan Burgers with a fried egg and shrimp chips.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde tries his hand at hibachi by making supreme fried rice with shrimp, chicken, and bacon, pretzel pork dumplings, mushroom noodles, a filet of beef with the famous onion volcano, and washes it down with a melon & mint sake slushy.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: Jess heads to Wyatt Ranches in South Texas to check out the cattle ranching operation they've been running since 1965.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew prepares a crave-able appetizer of bison tenderloin bites served with tamarind sauce and a classic Hunan peanut sauce. Then chef grills prosciutto-wrapped whole trout stuffed with lemon and herbs served with rice pilaf.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares a traditional Northern Italian-style wild boar ragu. Paired with a hearty bowl of pasta. Next, chef Zimmern blackens beautiful crimson filets of steelhead in a screaming hot cast iron pan.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern butchers a whole rabbit, then braises the meat in a rich and flavorful red chile sauce. He tops it off with a simple blended tomatillo salsa and fresh cilantro. Next, chef Zimmern cooks a comforting farmhouse meal of pheasant.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.sub-title: Best of Salina's Land and Sea
programme.desc: Jamie returns to cooking the food he loves the most, getting right to heart of the Italian kitchen.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie heads for one of the hottest food destinations in Italy, making hand-crafted pasta, a special seafood stew, and the region's answer to paella.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie visits the pizza capital of Italy to learn recipes from the locals and tries acquapazza, fish poached in crazy water.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie visits Basilicata in search of some old school Italian recipes and meets a family of shepherds and an 89-year-old macaroni master.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie gets a masterclass in Sicilian sweets and cooking up an epic tuna, prawn and pistachio spaghetti. There's also some chocolaty cannoli.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie is taking spaghetti bolognese to the next level and re-creating a mind-blowing Jewish-Italian recipe. There's also beef stew with pappardelle.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie tracks down some fast, fresh and easy recipes, featuring tasty minty pea tortiglioni and gnocchi with roasted tomato sauce and rocket pesto.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie is high up in the Italian Alps cooking some great comfort food, including dumplings, mind-blowing macaroni cheese, and a classic red wine and sausage risotto.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie gets a masterclass in Sicilian sweets and cooking up an epic tuna, prawn and pistachio spaghetti. There's also some chocolaty cannoli.
